Articles.Content:
Hi everyone.

I'm new around here, and new to the game. I've maybe a couple of posts in the gameplay section, but I thought it was best if I say hello here.

Enjoying the game loads, although I'm finding it quite difficult to land on the mun at the moment, but I'm sure I'll crack it.
Welcome to the "I'll get it figured someday" crowd!

Nice, i did get to the mun, after deaths of many kerbals, and hard work. I got to the mun. Jeb is stuck on the mun... Should send a ship down. Want to view some vids of KSP science and helpful info? Check it out! > http://www.youtube.com/user/szyzyg
